update T_BSS_PMS_PURCHASE_REQUIRED
PLAN_NAME = #{planName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAN_NO = #{planNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAN_TYPE = #{planType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTMENT = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAND = #{stand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUALIT_STAND = #{qualitStand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM = #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASE_COUNT = #{purchaseCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUDGET = #{budget,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DELIVER_DATE = #{deliverDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASE_TYPE = #{purchaseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_FREE_TAX = #{isFreeTax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_USE = #{goodsUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USE_UNIT = #{useUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

STARUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

AUDIT_DATE = #{auditDate,jdbcType=DATE},
ORGANIZATION = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_MASTER = #{isMaster,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_COLLECT = #{isCollect,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code = #{isCollect,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ONE_PURCHASETYPE=#{onePurchaseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ONE_ORGANIZA=#{oneOrganiza,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ONE_ADVICE=#{oneAdvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

REASON=#{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_BSS_PMS_PURCHASE_REQUIRED set PLAN_NAME = #{planName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLAN_NO = #{planNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLAN_TYPE = #{planType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTMENT = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAND = #{stand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUALIT_STAND = #{qualitStand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM = #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PURCHASE_COUNT = #{purchaseCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUDGET = #{budget,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELIVER_DATE = #{deliverDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PURCHASE_TYPE = #{purchaseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_FREE_TAX = #{isFreeTax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_USE = #{goodsUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USE_UNIT = #{useUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQ_LEVEL = #{reqLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STARUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HISTORY_STATUS = #{historyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_TYPE = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_DATE = #{auditDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGANIZATION = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_MASTER = #{isMaster,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_COLLECT = #{isCollect,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ONE_PURCHASETYPE=#{onePurchaseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ONE_ORGANIZA=#{oneOrganiza,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ONE_ADVICE=#{oneAdvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TWO_TECHADVICE=#{twoTechAdvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TWO_ADVICE=#{twoAdvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THREE_PURCHASETYPE=#{threePurchaseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THREE_ORGANIZA=#{threeOrganiza,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THREE_ADVICE=#{threeAdvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND=#{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_UNIT=#{userUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DETAIL_STATUS=#{detailStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REASON=#{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from T_BSS_PMS_PURCHASE_REQUIRED
HISTORY_STATUS='0' and IS_DELETE='0'
and PLAN_NO = #{planNo} ORDER BY IS_MASTER

select sum(BUDGET) as amount,DEPARTMENT as department from T_BSS_PMS_PURCHASE_REQUIRED
group by DEPARTMENT

select sum(BUDGET) as amount,PURCHASE_TYPE as purchaseType from T_BSS_PMS_PURCHASE_REQUIRED
group by PURCHASE_TYPE

select sum(BUDGET) as amount,to_char(CREATED_AT,'yyyy-mm') as month from T_BSS_PMS_PURCHASE_REQUIRED
group by to_char(CREATED_AT,'yyyy-mm')

select count(*) as count, ORGANIZATION as organization from T_BSS_PMS_PURCHASE_REQUIRED
group by ORGANIZATION
